issue.title: [R] Test R bindings on clang
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7829](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7829). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-7817. We're generating warnings that will fail a CRAN submission but due to Travis stuff we aren't catching them.

comments.body:
